column1: CLASSIC COWGIRL SOMETHIN' FANCY TRUFFLE BAG
column3: HOME|SHOP|CHOCOLATE TRUFFLES|CLASSIC COWGIRL SOMETHIN' FANCY TRUFFLE BAG
column4:
A 1/4 Pound of your favorite Truffles in a pretty gift bag with one of our signature 'old west' buttons. Make it your way with one flavor, mixed flavor, spicy or mild! This is one of our most popular gift items!
If you would like to add a card or message with your order, please use the special order instructions as you check out.

column3: HOME|SHOP|CARAMELS|NOTHIN' FANCY ONE POUND CARAMELS
column4: It might be nothin' fancy but it's darn good eatin'! One pound of delicious caramels in a plastic bag. 6 select flavors to choose from. Our Classic Cowgirl flavors: Mild Sea Salt, Spicy Chipotle, and our Buckin' Hot Habanero. Plus our new flavors: Green Apple, Butterscotch, and Chocolate Sea Salt! Can't decide? Let us mix them all together for you. Have it your way with this 1 pound favorite!

column1: CLASSIC COWGIRL NOTHIN' FANCY ONE POUND BAG
column3: HOME|SHOP|CHOCOLATE TRUFFLES|CLASSIC COWGIRL NOTHIN' FANCY ONE POUND BAG
column4:
It might be Nothin" Fancy but it's real good eatin'! One Pound of assorted truffles. You decide - all spicy, all mild, or a mix of spicy and mild!
If you would like to add a card or message with your order, please use the special order instructions as you check out.

column3: HOME|SHOP|CHOCOLATE TRUFFLES|WESTERN TRAIL LUNCHBOX TRUFFLES
column4: **Note - We no longer have the Mild Double Dark Chocolate Cocoa available. ** A perfect gift for your favorite cowgirl or boy… an old fashioned lunch tin with gift card …holds a 1⁄4 pound bag of spicy truffles and a 1⁄4 pound bag of mild and an 8 oz can of our famous cocoa.

column3: HOME|SHOP|CARAMELS|1/4 POUND FANCY CARAMEL BAG
column4: 1/4 pound of our delicious caramels in a pretty gift bag with one of our signature "old west" button.

column1: SPICY AND MILD OLD FASHIONED HOT CHOCOLATE
column3: HOME|SHOP|COCOA AND SAUCES|SPICY AND MILD OLD FASHIONED HOT CHOCOLATE
column4:
** Mild Double Dark Chocolate Chunk Cocoa is Back ordered. Only the Spicy Hot and the Mild Mocha are available at this time. **
  Cowgirl Chocolates Old Fashioned Hot Cocoa is made the same way they used to make it back in the Old West. We take our rich cocoa powder and mix it with chunks of dark chocolate to ensure you’re gettin’ a thick and creamy cup every-time. Kick off your boots and set a spell to sip some darn tasty cocoa from days gone by with our Spicy Double Dark Chocolate Chunk (has just the right amount of heat), Mild Double Dark Chocolate Chunk (for the not so adventurous) and Mild Fancy Sippin’ Chocolate Mocha (with a shot of espresso for good measure).

column1: COWGIRL SIGNATURE 1/2 POUND CARAMEL GIFT WRAP
column3: HOME|SHOP|CARAMELS|COWGIRL SIGNATURE 1/2 POUND CARAMEL GIFT WRAP
column4: Our fabulous caramels (you choose your favorite) all dressed up in our signature gift wrap, logo card, grosgrain ribbon, and western button.

column3: HOME|SHOP|CHOCOLATE TRUFFLES|CLASSIC COWGIRL MILD MANNERED TRUFFLE TIN

If you would like to add a card or message with your order, please use the special order instructions at check out. 
If you prefer to order all of one  flavor, please place the request in the special order instructions at check out.

Or, if you would like a special combination, just put your request in the comments area at check out. We will be happy to customize your order.

column3: HOME|SHOP|GIFTS AND SPECIAL OCCASIONS|COWGIRL CHOCOLATES CHILI LIME PISTACHIOS
column4: Cowgirl Chocolates is going nuts! Spicy nuts - that is! The first in our series of nut selections is our new, Chili and Lime Pistachios in their shells. These are 'to die for' flavor! This product is hard to get a hold of so quantities are limited and an 'as we can get them' gift item. If you are a Pistachio lover or have one in your family circle that is - you can't go wrong with this gift selection. 7 oz. of Pistachios in our Lime Green latching tin. YUM!!

This is the perfect party sampler! We can add a note card if you would like. Just specify your message at check out.

column1: 1/2 POUND MILD DOUBLE DARK FANCY TRUFFLE BOX - 20 PIECES
column3: HOME|SHOP|CHOCOLATE TRUFFLES|1/2 POUND MILD DOUBLE DARK FANCY TRUFFLE BOX - 20 PIECES
column4:
The Holidays are coming and Cowgirl Chocolates is introducing our Very Fancy packaging. Something New and Something Pretty! With our new 1/2 pound selection, we will make this box up with a 1/2 pound of your favorite flavor. We are offering: Mild Double Dark, Spicy Cappuccino, Mild Milk Chocolate, and Spicy Hazelnut. We CAN do a custom order for you with any of the other flavors - just email us or call, or you can simply put in the special instruction box at check out the flavor you would like. The ribbons and buttons may vary.
Don't forget the special sentiment to go along with your gift!

column1: HOT AND SPICY CHOCOLATE SAUCE - LIMITED ITEM
column3: HOME|SHOP|COCOA AND SAUCES|HOT AND SPICY CHOCOLATE SAUCE - LIMITED ITEM
column4: " Go Ahead... Make my Sundae!"  Cowgirl Chocolates won an award with this product, but, alas, it is no longer available. So - when these jars are gone, that will be it until I can find another source. Our chocolate sauce has a spicy kick with a touch of hot! A trifecta of flavors including Chipotle, Cayenne Pepper, and Jalapeno - with a dash of Sea Salt! Dip your Strawberries, or pour it over your favorite Ice Cream. Get them while they last!
